projectGridLines.title: Financial Services SaaS platform
projectGridLines.description: We are a young startup with the vision to disrupt the financial services space by creating a cloud agnostic multi-tenant SaaS platform. Every aspect of the platform is being built to be configurable using custom workflow engine, rules engine and a UI rendering engine. The platform includes multiple areas of innovation such as cloud orchestration, tenant lifecycle management, domain based microservices and event driven microservice orchestration using a service bus. The project offers a unique opportunity to work on highly complex technical areas on a production grade SaaS platform.
